mapper.select: SELECT A.RBNO AS RBNO, A.RBSUBJECT AS RBSUBJECT, A.RBNAME AS RBNAME, A.RBIMG AS RBIMG, A.RBCONTENT AS RBCONTENT, A.ACADEMY_ANO AS ACADEMY_ANO, A.MEMBER_MNO AS MEMBER_MNO, A.RBGRADE AS RBGRADE, A.RBDELETEYN AS RBDELETEYN, TO_CHAR(A.RBINSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RBINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.RBUPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RBUPDATEDATE FROM REVIEWBOARD A ORDER BY 1 DESC
